properties.Name: CustomerSocialMediaPlatformUser
properties.Description: A Customer which is represented as a user of a Social Media Platform.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: SocialMediaPlatformId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Social Media Platform.

Columns.Name: SocialMediaPlatformUserId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Social Media Platform User.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: CustomerSocialMediaPlatformUserNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Customer Social Media Platform User.
